QUERY.TITLE: Letter Bomb for Kiesbauer
QUERY.DESC: Find information on the explosion of a letter bomb in the studio of the TV channel PRO7 presenter Arabella Kiesbauer .
QUERY.NARR: A letter bomb from right-wing radicals sent to the black TV personality Arabella Kiesbauer exploded in a studio of the TV channel PRO7 on June 9th , 1995 . An assistant was injured . All reports on the explosion and police inquiries after the event are relevant . Other reports on letter bomb attacks are of no interest .
